name: River Racer (De_Engineer)
description:
River Racer takes place in a world where humans have polluted the planet to an extreme level. You race against time in a small boat collecting trash and avoiding turtles and obstacles trying to save the world from humans. Use Arrow keys or WASD to move. This game was made for the TeamSeas game contest. To learn more, go to #TeamSeas 

This is my first ever released game! Let me know what things I can improve on.

Thank you to my friend 7teen for being my beta tester and for the title screen text.

Thank you to zapsplat for all the sound effects and music.

Thanks to Kids can code, HeartBeast and GDquest for all of their great tutorials.

I referenced codat's procedural generation video for the terrain.
